tasks.label: build-tests
tasks.command: mkdir -p build && ICU_HEADER=$(find /Users/mg/.conan2 -path '*include/unicode/ucsdet.h' 2>/dev/null | head -n 1) && ICU_INCLUDE_DIR=$(dirname "$(dirname "$ICU_HEADER")") && ICU_LIB_DIR=${ICU_INCLUDE_DIR%/include}/lib && clang++ -std=c++23 -I${workspaceFolder}/cpp/src -I${workspaceFolder}/cpp/src/test -I${workspaceFolder}/unit_test/src -I"$ICU_INCLUDE_DIR" -L"$ICU_LIB_DIR" ${workspaceFolder}/cpp/src/test/*.cpp -licuuc -licui18n -licudata -licuio -g -O0 -o ${workspaceFolder}/build/tests
